title: Failed to normalize <std::borrow::Cow<str> as rkyv::Archive>::Resolver

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: E-needs-mcve
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue needs a Minimal Complete and Verifiable Example

body:
### Code ```TOML [package] name = "minimal" version = "0.1.0" edition = "2021" [dependencies] rkyv = "0.7" ``` ```Rust use rkyv::Archive; use std::borrow::Cow; #[derive(Archive)] pub struct Wrapper<'a>(Cow<'a, str>); ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.59.0 (9d1b2106e 2022-02-23) binary: rustc commit-hash: 9d1b2106e23b1abd32fce1f17267604a5102f57a commit-date: 2022-02-23 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.59.0 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` ### Error output ``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:179:90: Failed to normalize as rkyv::Archive>::Resolver, maybe try to call `try_normalize_erasing_regions` instead ```
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_middle/src/ty/normalize_erasing_regions.rs:179:90: Failed to normalize as rkyv::Archive>::Resolver, maybe try to call `try_normalize_erasing_regions` instead thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1169:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x623f31a96b9c -
